    Skills.

    what skills i have

    Javascript

    JavaScript is a dynamic programming language. It is most commonly used as part of web browsers whose implementations allow client-side scripts to communicate with the user, control the browser, communicate asynchronously, and change the content of HTML documents.

    Html

    HyperText Markup Language is a markup language that primarily aims to make text and images on a website appear as links to other HTML pages. Markup means to pay attention, and HTML is used to structure websites and determine the look.

    Css

    Cascading Style Sheets is a computer language used to describe how you want the content of an HTML / XHTML / XML document presented, e.g. in a browser. In HTML you can embed the CSS code in a style element or have it in files separately

    Animations

    CSS Animations is a proposed Cascading Style Sheets module that allows animation of HTML document elements using CSS.
